orgs.name: Texas 4000 for Cancer
orgs.description: Texas 4000 is an organization dedicated to fighting cancer and developing future leaders. Each summer, a team of students from The University of Texas at Austin bikes from Austin, TX to Anchorage, AK on a 70-day journey while spreading the message of cancer prevention along the way.

orgs.name: MD Anderson Cancer Center
orgs.description: MD Anderson, located in Houston, TX, is widely considered the foremost cancer center in the world. Each year, over 127,000 patients are treated at our facilities.

orgs.name: Doctors without Borders
orgs.description: Our doctors are sent to over 70 countries to deliver medical care to war-torn regions and developing countries.

orgs.name: Leukemia & Lymphoma Society
orgs.description: LLS is the largest voluntary health organization dedicated to funding research, finding cures and ensuring access to treatments for blood cancer patients.

orgs.name: National MS Society
orgs.description: Today, more than 2.3 million people are affected by multiple sclerosis, an autoimmune disease that leads to brain and spinal cord damage. Our aim is a world free of MS.

orgs.name: Big Brothers/Big Sisters of America
orgs.description: We believe that every child has the ability to succeed and thrive in life. Our organization works to provide mentors to the youth of today.

orgs.name: World Wildlife Fund
orgs.description: World Wildlife Fund conserves planet, habitats, and species.

orgs.name: Mothers Against Drunk Driving
orgs.description: We strive to stop drunk driving, support those affected by drunk driving, prevent underage drinking, and strive for stricter impaired driving policy.

orgs.name: Keep America Beautiful
orgs.description: We focus on litter prevention, waste reduction/recycling and community greening and beautification in order to Keep America Beautiful

orgs.name: Water.org
orgs.description: We've empowered more than 6 million people with access to safe water and sanitation. Help us continue our work of unlocking education, economic prosperity, and improved health by providing one of the most basic of human necessities.

orgs.name: Make-A-Wish Foundation
orgs.description: You can be a part of granting a child's one-true-wish, changing their lives forever.

orgs.name: American Heart Association
orgs.date_joined: Join our efforts to reduce death caused by heart disease and stroke through education and research.
orgs.description: Dan Jukes

orgs.name: Paralyzed Veterans of America
orgs.description: Our organization provides services to paralyzed veterans for holistic recovery and transition - from medical services to sports and recreation.

orgs.name: Action Against Hunger
orgs.description: About 795 million people go to bed hungry every night. Nearly half of all child deaths worldwide are from causes related to undernutrition, even though itâ€™s predictable, preventable, and treatable. Help us fight against world hunger today.

orgs.name: Fresh Air Fund
orgs.description: Since 1877, we have been providing free summer opportunities to children living in low-income communities - help a child have an unforgettable experience.

orgs.name: UNICEF
orgs.description: UNICEF protects and defends the rights of every child by providing vaccines, nutritional supplements, educational supplies, and more.

orgs.name: National Park Foundation
orgs.description: As the official charitable partner of the National Park Service, we provide resources for the national parks. Support this uniquely American idea.

orgs.name: Operation Smile
orgs.description: Every three minutes a child is born with a cleft lip or cleft palate. At Operation Smile we believe every child suffering from a cleft condition deserves exceptional surgical care.

orgs.name: Oxfam
orgs.description: Oxfam is a global movement of people working together to end the injustice of poverty. With 70 years of experience in more than 90 countries, Oxfam helps people save lives in disasters, build stronger futures for themselves, and hold the powerful accountable.

orgs.name: Habitat for Humanity
orgs.description: Every volunteer and donation makes a difference. Join us to help families build stronger foundations for the future in your community and around the world.
